about.heading: Breaking the Silence on Mental Health

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: DZ Aman is creating a safe, culturally-sensitive space for Algerians to address trauma and mental health challenges. We understand the unique cultural context and are building support that respects our heritage.

why.title: Why It Matters
why.description: Mental health is health. In Algeria, conversations about trauma and mental wellbeing are often silenced. DZ Aman empowers individuals to seek help, heal, and thrive in a supportive environment.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: Combining modern therapeutic methods with cultural understanding, DZ Aman offers resources, community support, and professional guidance tailored for the Algerian experience.

waitlist.heading: Join the Waitlist
